history.proof: intros E. unfold EQ, inj, Power. induction E as [A f]. split. - intros x. exists x. shelve. - intros y. exists y. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall E : Ens', EQ (inj (Power' E)) (Power (inj E))

Premises:
Power = fun E : Ens => match E with | sup A f => sup (A -> Prop) (fun P : A -> Prop => sup (depprod A (fun a : A => P a)) (fun c : depprod A (fun a : A => P a) => match c with | @dep_i _ _ a _ => f a end)) end : Ens -> Ens
inj = fun X : Ens' => Ens'_rect (fun _ : Ens' => Ens) (fun (A : Type) (_ : A -> Ens') (fr : A -> Ens) => sup A fr) X : Ens' -> Ens
EQ = fun X : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Ens -> Prop) (fun (A : Type) (_ : A -> Ens) (eq1 : A -> Ens -> Prop) (X0 : Ens) => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Prop) (fun (B : Type) (g : B -> Ens) (_ : B -> Prop) => (forall x : A, EXType B (fun y : B => eq1 x (g y))) /\ (forall y : B, EXType A (fun x : A => eq1 x (g y)))) X0) X : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
Inductive Ens : Type := sup : forall A : Type, (A -> Ens) -> Ens Arguments sup _%type_scope _%function_scope
inj_sound : forall E1 E2 : Ens', EQ' E1 E2 -> EQ (inj E1) (inj E2)
Power_sound : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> EQ (Power E) (Power E')
Power_mon : forall E E' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC (Power E) (Power E')
IN_Power_INC : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' (Power E) -> INC E' E
INC_IN_Power : forall E E' : Ens, INC E' E -> IN E' (Power E)
EQ_refl : forall E : Ens, EQ E E
Union_sound : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> EQ (Union E) (Union E')
EQ_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> forall a : pi1 E, EXType (pi1 E') (fun b : pi1 E' => EQ (pi2 E a) (pi2 E' b))
Paire_IN : forall E E' A : Ens, IN A (Paire E E') -> EQ A E \/ EQ A E'
EQ_INC : forall E E' : Ens, EQ E E' -> INC E E'
IN_Sing_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, IN E (Sing E') -> EQ E E'
INC_EQ : forall E E' : Ens, INC E E' -> INC E' E -> EQ E E'
tout_vide_est_Vide : forall E : Ens, (forall E' : Ens, IN E' E -> F) -> EQ E Vide
IN_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E E' -> IN E E'' -> IN E' E''
IN_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> IN E E' -> IN E E''
INC_sound_right : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E' E'' -> INC E E' -> INC E E''
INC_sound_left : forall E E' E'' : Ens, EQ E E' -> INC E E'' -> INC E' E''
IN_EXType : forall E E' : Ens, IN E' E -> EXType (pi1 E) (fun a : pi1 E => EQ E' (pi2 E a))
not_EQ_Vide_Sing : forall E : Ens, EQ Vide (Sing E) -> F
not_EQ_Sing_Vide : forall E : Ens, EQ (Sing E) Vide -> F
Ens'_rect : forall P : Ens' -> Type, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
Ens'_sind : forall P : Ens' -> SProp, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
Ens'_rec : forall P : Ens' -> Set, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
Ens'_ind : forall P : Ens' -> Prop, (forall (A : Type) (e : A -> Ens'), (forall a : A, P (e a)) -> P (sup' A e)) -> forall e : Ens', P e
IN_P_Comp : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A E -> P A -> IN A (Comp E P)
IN_Comp_P : forall (E A : Ens) (P : Ens -> Prop), (forall w1 w2 : Ens, P w1 -> EQ w1 w2 -> P w2) -> IN A (Comp E P) -> P A
pi2 : forall E : Ens, pi1 E -> Ens
IN_Sing : forall E : Ens, IN E (Sing E)
EQ_tran : forall E1 E2 E3 : Ens, EQ E1 E2 -> EQ E2 E3 -> EQ E1 E3
EQ_sym : forall E1 E2 : Ens, EQ E1 E2 -> EQ E2 E1
EQ_Sing_EQ : forall E1 E2 : Ens, EQ (Sing E1) (Sing E2) -> EQ E1 E2
Sing_sound : forall A A' : Ens, EQ A A' -> EQ (Sing A) (Sing A')
INC = fun E1 E2 : Ens => forall E : Ens, IN E E1 -> IN E E2 : Ens -> Ens -> Prop
Paire_sound_right : forall A B B' : Ens, EQ B B' -> EQ (Paire A B) (Paire A B')
Paire_sound_left : forall A A' B : Ens, EQ A A' -> EQ (Paire A B) (Paire A' B)
Sing = fun E : Ens => Paire E E : Ens -> Ens
Paire = fun E E' : Ens => sup bool (fun H : bool => bool_rect (fun _ : bool => Ens) E E' H) : Ens -> Ens -> Ens
Power' = fun E : Ens' => match E with | sup' A f => sup' (A -> Prop) (fun P : A -> Prop => sup' (depprod'' A (fun a : A => P a)) (fun c : depprod'' A (fun a : A => P a) => match c with | @dep_i'' _ _ a _ => f a end)) end : Ens' -> Ens'
Union = fun E : Ens => Ens_rect (fun _ : Ens => Ens) (fun (A : Type) (f _ : A -> Ens) => sup (depprod A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x))) (fun X : depprod A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) => depprod_rect A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) (fun _ : depprod A (fun x : A => pi1 (f x)) => Ens) (fun (a : A) (b : pi1 (f a)) => pi2 (f a) b) X)) E : Ens -> Ens
IN = fun E1 E2 : Ens => match E2 with | sup A f => EXType A (fun y : A => EQ E1 (f y)) end : Ens -> Ens -> Prop

``` 
intros E.
unfold EQ, inj, Power.
induction E as [A f].
unfold EQ.
split.
- intros x. exists x. reflexivity.
- intros y.
  apply E.
  exists y.
  reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros E. unfold EQ, inj, Power. induction E as [A f]. unfold EQ. split. - intros x. exists x. reflexivity. - intros y. apply E. exists y. reflexivity.
